name: Only Down
description:
Only Down was made with speed runners in mind. Your skill will be tested. Victories are gained by the inch in this unforgiving puzzle platformer. Work your way downwards though a maze of platforms and obstacles to get Nano home safely. Be careful, for you are a mere mortal who can only fall so far without the ultimate consequence.

Players are encouraged to get down as fast as possible. There is a stopwatch counting your every second. We also encourage anyone that finishes to post a screenshot of your finish time. We will be working on a formal leader board post launch.

You are a being called Nano that has been run out of his home by The Uni-Guard. Nano found a safe place to live, and wised-up. He constructed a dangerous maze to prevent the Guard from ever finding his new home. After a long excursion, it was time for Nano to make his way back home....only down...through the maze.
